item.title: About
item.description: languages = [ 'Python', 'Javascript', 'Go', 'PHP', ] databases = ['PostgreSQL', 'MongoDB', 'MySQL', 'MS SQL Server', ] frameworks = ['Express', 'Qt', 'Bootstrap', 'socket.io', ] skills = [ languages + databases + frameworks ] I'm Jereme Causing, a Software Developer from Metro Manila, Philippines. I love to share what I know through blogging, participating in communities, and training. I've been working on the web for around 7 years and have experienced a lot of endeavors.
